fields.summary: In July 2023, a number of news outlets in the UK carried stories about how driving in flip flops could land you with a fine and points on your licence.
fields.details: In each of the stories, it is clarified that the fine is not due to a specific ‘flip flop offence’ but instead it may be captured under the “driving without due care and attention” and “not being in proper control” of the vehicle.
fields.link: An example of the sorts of articles circulating can be found here: https://www.thesun.co.uk/motors/6860103/driving-flip-flops-5000-fine-sliders
fields.explanation: This story is true! As explained in each of the stories, it is not necessarily illegal to drive in flip flops, but it could cause you to fall foul of other driving laws; landing you with a hefty fine and points on your licence.
